titleInfo.title: Fire company on parade, LSU Campus parade grounds, Baton Rouge.

subject.topic: Louisiana State University and Agricultural and Mechanical College

mods.note: 'On occasion, Lytle Studio would create large-scale images such as this wide view of the old campus LSU parade grounds with four different fire companies and some of their equipment. What appears to be a review stand has been assembled in the background, ca. 1900.' Mark E. Martin, in Andrew D. Lytleâ€™s Baton Rouge: photographs 1863-1910, (Baton Rouge, LSU Press, 2008), p. 68.

titleInfo.title: Andrew D. Lytle's Baton Rouge' Photograph Collection/
